general.description: This small moon's reason for existing is the valuable minerals located in the crust of the volatile Odonga planet itself. It also serves as a stopping point for Dvaered military ships and the occasional trader on their way into Za'lek space or the wilder southern galactic regions.
general.bar: The bar has a foot in two worlds In one, the quiet, clean efficiency of a trader bar. In the other, the filthy mess of a Dvaered bar. The overall effect is less than the sum of its parts.
